Magic Armor.NAME: Magic Armor
DESCRIPTIONS: add 1 of 3 random cards with the keyword #yBlock

Rorschach's Journal.NAME: Rorschach's Journal
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn, adds the #yRorschach-stain to the draw pile.

Eye-Opener.NAME: Eye-Opener
DESCRIPTIONS: Until the end of the turn, all #yRorschach-stains added to the draw pile will be upgraded.
